Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
restricted cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: contract with customer asset net current
Receivables: allowance for doubtful accounts receivable current

Long-term Investments: notes and loans receivable net noncurrent
Other Non-Current Assets: operating lease right of use asset
Property, Plant, and Equipment (net): accumulated depreciation depletion and amortization property plant and equipment

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss foreign currency translation adjustment net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss other net of tax
Common Stock and APIC: common stock including additional paid in capital
common stocks including additional paid in capital
Total Equity: stockholders equity including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Short-term Debt: long term debt and capital lease obligations current

Long-term Debt: long term debt and capital lease obligations
Other Non-Current Liabilities: pension and other postretirement defined benefit plans liabilities noncurrent

__unmapped__: assets of disposal group including discontinued operation
assets of disposal group including discontinued operation total
common stock par or stated value per share
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation total
temporary equity carrying amount including portion attributable to noncontrolling interests
unearned e s o p shares
